import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { logout, update } from '../actions/userActions'; function ProfileScreen(props) { const [name, setName] = useState(''); const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const [password, setPassword] = useState(''); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const handleLogout = () => { dispatch(logout()); } const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); dispatch(update({ email, name, password })) } return
